name: Pirate Ship Dribbling

objectCreation: 5 LC markers forming the 45x30 boundary.
contextPMVL: P1-P5 Dribble (Start: X=40, Y=30, End: X=80, Y=50, Trajectory: Free) P1 Control (Ball-Distance < 1 unit).

contextPMVL: P1 Tap (Source: P1, Target: BL, Start: X=60, Y=40, End: X=60, Y=40, Trajectory: Vertical/Static).

objectCreation: 5 LC markers forming the 45x30 boundary.

objectCreation: 4 SC markers for the 20x20 active zone at X=50, Y=30.

objectCreation: 5 LC markers for the 45x30 boundary.
